name: The Octopus Affair
description:
The Octopus Affair

Be an octopus, swim around an aquarium. 

A nugget of a game created for Wizard Jam 7 by Jon Coughlin and Caleb Sullivan.
with art and sound from the internet

Gamepad suggested, keyboard and mouse optional. 
Conrtols available in-game with "Esc" or "Start/Options" button

Devlog: https://www.idlethumbs.net/forums/topic/12154-dev-log-the-octopus-affair/
